Name: Farmtale
About the game: Farmtale is a farming idle clicker hybrid with focus on building, customization, and management. On a deserted Island, you start with enough coins to buy a chicken. Collect eggs, chop trees, gather materials, and catch fish to gain enough income to expand your farming adventure. Build, explore, and decorate in a colorful world full of interactions. Sandbox Building – From crops to livestock, you choose your own type of farm. Animals and Crops - Buy different animals and crops, and market a variety of products such as meat, eggs, milk, potatoes, pumpkins, pineapples and more. Workers – Hire different types of farmers to manage your ever-expanding farming plot. Upgrades and Items - With hundreds of upgrades and items available, boost your livestock, crops, workers or buildings as you please. Customize Your Farm - Free your creativity with plenty of decorations for your farm buildings - and even animals! Achievements and Quests – Complete achievements and quests as you progress to earn exclusive rewards! Recycle and Refine – Not everything you find will be useful. Recycle items you don't need and spend your materials on something else! We appreciate all types of feedback, positive and constructive. Feel free to join our wholesome community on Discord for latest updates and news!
